Oyuna sürekli yeni güncellemeler,skinler ve benzeri çok içerik geliyor,üstüne valvenin sundukları dışında oyuncuların açmış olduğu sunucularla oyun daha bi zenginleşiyor eğer oyundan gerçekten haz almak istiyorsanız nişan refleksinizi geliştirmenizde fayda var
I have had countless hours of fun on this game with my friend highly recomend

Good Shooter game, been enjoying this game for many years now and never got bored of it. every round is very different. only downside is the community from time to time. lots of toxic players. but this is a problem with allot of online games.
I like that the anti-cheat is soo good.  never come across hackers in matches. valve are really on point with this. so highly reccomend this game. but only to my worst enemys
